page.title: 03Employment
page.content: {Employment} The major employers in the area are H.M.Prison service at New Hall Detention Centre for young offenders, Flockton The N.C.B. at Denby Grange Colliery and Job Ernshaw of Midgely Timber merchants. Netherton is mainly a dormitory Village for professional and semi-professional commutors to Leeds, Sheffield, Huddersfield and Wakefield, and the mojority of the population are employed out of the area. Farming also employs a minimal number. Flockton like Netherton was formally a mining community but Flockton also seems to a large extent as a dormitory area for people employed in the surrounding towns.
